pre_caption: This fast-moving video provides an aerial, point-of-view shot of a city at dusk. The scene captures a dense urban environment with numerous skyscrapers and buildings under construction, evidenced by large cranes. The warm colors of the sunset are visible in the sky as the city lights begin to illuminate the landscape below.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
